jobDescription: About Paysafe  Paysafe is a leading global provider of end-to-end payment solutions. Its core purpose is to enable businesses and consumers to connect and transact seamlessly through industry-leading capabilities in payment processing, digital wallet and online cash solutions. Delivered through an integrated platform, Paysafe solutions are geared toward mobile-initiated transactions, real-time analytics and the convergence between brick-and-mortar and online payments. With over 20 years of online payment experience, a combined transactional volume of US $56 billion in 2017 and around 3,000 employees located in 12+ global locations. Paysafe connects businesses and consumers across 200 payment types in over 40 currencies around the world. For more information, visit www.paysafe.com  The Data Analyst candidate will play an integral role within the Risk Analytics department by assisting in the development and automation of tools and reporting necessary for global risk management. Under the direction of the candidate's manager, the Data Analyst is responsible for developing fully automated reporting, metrics, and dashboards that will summarize the performance of our portfolio, individual merchants, and department Key Performance Indicators (KPIs). The Data Analyst is expected to provide support for the Risk Monitoring, Credit Underwriting, and Compliance teams.  The Data Analyst will be responsible for conceptualizing and developing data-driven risk solutions by applying advanced analytical techniques. This person will play an absolutely critical role in the global risk team, developing rules and models to effectively detect risk within the overall portfolio. As our company grows and we build out our underwriting and risk monitoring capabilities, this person will help build systems to scale our business in an efficient manner as well as developing our long-term roadmap for effective risk detection. The Data Analyst is expected to thoroughly understand the payments risk domain, and frequently interact with risk analysts in the team to understand the emerging trends in merchant risk profiles and translate those findings in to tangible solutions. The candidate will support overall risk goals through detailed data analysis that results in policies, programs, and broad strategies to deliver a world-class risk management experience to our merchants. The candidate is expected to do root-cause analysis of directional change in KPIs and provide analytical horsepower to the operational teams. The candidate is expected to be a quick-learner and to be self-motivated to take on new challenges.
